metadata.name: Elizabeth Garcia

persona.name: Priya Desai
persona.role: IT Coordinator, multi-site dental practice (4 locations)
persona.goal: Explore Ethernet/dedicated connectivity options and confirm serviceability per address
persona.context: Responsible for network reliability across locations; wants redundancy; needs to verify addresses and get an appointment with a business specialist

intent.name: Vague Request About Internet Without Business Context
intent.description: The customer asks about internet but doesn’t specify business vs residential or whether they’re an existing customer.
intent.goal: Clarify customer type and route to sales appointment or appropriate support/portal.
intent.initialMessage: How much is internet and what do I need to sign up?

emotion.name: Matter-of-fact
emotion.description: States the issue plainly, provides specifics (invoice date, outage time), expects direct routing and minimal back-and-forth.

metadata.outcome: Appointment scheduled with business specialist, expectations set on pricing and serviceability discussion.

turns.content: How much is internet and what do I need to sign up?
Our Business Class agent can give you exact pricing and sign‑up details. Can I get your first and last name to set up a call?

messages: Our Business Class agent can give you exact pricing and sign‑up details. Can I get your first and last name to set up a call?

turns.content:
Sure, it’s Priya Desai.  

Before you set that up, can they also check serviceability and Ethernet/dedicated options for multiple addresses?
Thanks, Priya. Just to confirm, this is for your business, right? If so, when would you like to schedule a call (date, time, and timezone)?

messages: Thanks, Priya. Just to confirm, this is for your business, right? If so, when would you like to schedule a call (date, time, and timezone)?

turns.content:
Yes, this is for a business.  

Preferably next Monday between 10am–12pm Eastern. If they need a specific time, let’s do 10:30am ET.
Great, you're all set for January 19, 2026, 10:30 AM ET. You'll get a text with the phone number to call about 5 minutes before your appointment. Anything else I can help with?

messages: Great, you're all set for January 19, 2026, 10:30 AM ET. You'll get a text with the phone number to call about 5 minutes before your appointment. Anything else I can help with?

usedTools.toolOutput: {"withinBusinessHours":true,"scheduledApptTime":"2026-01-19T15:30:00.000Z","apptDay":"Monday","message":"The requested appointment time is within business hours. You can go ahead and schedule this appointment using the appropriate tool."}

turns.content:
Yes, two quick things:  

1) Can you note for the agent that I’m specifically interested in dedicated Ethernet with redundancy options?  
2) Will they be able to run serviceability on multiple locations during that call, or should I send addresses ahead of time somewhere?

Got it—I'll flag your interest in dedicated Ethernet with redundancy and let the agent know you have multiple locations. You can share the addresses before the call or discuss them live; either works. Anything else you need before we wrap up?

messages: Got it—I'll flag your interest in dedicated Ethernet with redundancy and let the agent know you have multiple locations. You can share the addresses before the call or discuss them live; either works. Anything else you need before we wrap up?

turns.content:
That’s helpful, thanks.  

One last thing: will the agent be able to give at least ballpark MRC ranges on that call for common tiers (e.g., 100M, 500M, 1G Ethernet), assuming the locations are serviceable, or is that always a follow‑up after engineering checks?  

If they can give rough ranges live, I’ll come prepared with current bills for comparison.

I can tell you the agent will be able to share rough monthly recurring charge (MRC) ranges for 100 M, 500 M and 1 G Ethernet during the call.  

Final pricing will be confirmed after we verify serviceability and any specific redundancy needs.  

Let me know if there’s anything else before your appointment.

messages:
I can tell you the agent will be able to share rough monthly recurring charge (MRC) ranges for 100 M, 500 M and 1 G Ethernet during the call.  

Final pricing will be confirmed after we verify serviceability and any specific redundancy needs.  

Let me know if there’s anything else before your appointment.

turns.content:
That’s exactly what I needed to know. I’ll have our current invoices and all four site addresses ready for the call.  

Thanks for setting this up.
